Package idare.subnetwork.internal

Class NetworkViewSwitcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cytoscape.task.AbstractNodeViewTaskFactory
      • idare.subnetwork.internal.NetworkViewSwitcher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.cytoscape.event.CyListener, org.cytoscape.model.events.NetworkAboutToBeDestroyedListener, org.cytoscape.model.events.RowsSetListener, org.cytoscape.session.events.SessionAboutToBeSavedListener, org.cytoscape.task.NodeViewTaskFactory
    public class NetworkViewSwitcher
extends org.cytoscape.task.AbstractNodeViewTaskFactory
implements org.cytoscape.model.events.NetworkAboutToBeDestroyedListener, org.cytoscape.model.events.RowsSetListener, org.cytoscape.session.events.SessionAboutToBeSavedListener
    A Class that acts as switcher between networks.
    Author:
    Thomas Pfau

      • addSubNetworkView

        public void addSubNetworkView​(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork network,
                              org.cytoscape.view.model.CyNetworkView view)
        Add a new Network to the list of existing networks and also add its view.
        Parameters:
        network - - The new CyNetwork
        view - - A CyNetworkView for the provided CyNetwork

      • addNetworkToTree

        public void addNetworkToTree​(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork parent,
                             org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork child,
                             String ColumnID,
                             String NetworkID)
        Add a subnetwork to the subnetwork hierarchy.
        Parameters:
        parent - The parent network (to retrieve the parent node, or create it if parent non null
        child - The child node (i.e. the node to add to the hierarchy
        ColumnID - The Column the subnetwork is generated from.
        NetworkID - The ID of the network (should be an entry of the column indicated).

      • getSubNetworkName

        public String getSubNetworkName​(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork network)
        Get the internal name of the network (i.e. the identifier used)
        Parameters:
        network - The network to retrieve a name for
        Returns:
        The name used to identify the network.

      • getExistingNetworks

        public HashMap<org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork,​org.cytoscape.view.model.CyNetworkView> getExistingNetworks()

      • getExistingNetworksForColumn

        public HashMap<org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork,​org.cytoscape.view.model.CyNetworkView> getExistingNetworksForColumn​(String selectedColumn)
        Get the subnetworks that currently exist for the provided column present in any parent network
        Parameters:
        selectedColumn - The Column to obtain the Network to View pairs for
        Returns:
        A Map of CyNetwork to CyNetworkView pairs. The Views can be null, if there is no existing view for the given network.

      • getSubNetworkWorksForNetwork

        public Set<String> getSubNetworkWorksForNetwork​(org.cytoscape.model.CyNetwork parentnetwork,
                                                String ColName)
        Get the Names of all subnetworks for a specific parent network and a specific column.
        Parameters:
        parentnetwork - the parent network to retrieve subnetwork names for
        ColName - the currently selected Column (to only return names specific for this network)
        Returns:
        A Set of String with al the subnetwork Names for the provided parent network created using the specified column.
